mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESERVATION A LEFT JOIN TBL_CLASS B ON (B.CLS_RSV_NO = A.RSV_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.RSV_MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND A.RSV_STATE = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(A.RSV_DATETIME, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND C.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.CLS_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.RSV_NO , A.RSV_DATETIME , A.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , A.RSV_STATE , A.RSV_TYPE , A.RSV_MEMBER_ID , A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID , E.CLS_NO , E.CLS_CONTENT , E.CLS_RSV_NO , E.CLS_MEMBER_ID , F.MEMBER_NAME RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_NAME , D.MEMBER_NAME RSV_MEMBER_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.RSV_NO , B.RSV_DATETIME , B.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , B.RSV_STATE , B.RSV_TYPE , B.RSV_MEMBER_ID , B.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID FROM (SELECT C.RSV_NO , C.RSV_DATETIME , C.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , C.RSV_STATE , C.RSV_TYPE , C.RSV_MEMBER_ID , C.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_RESERVATION C ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex } + #{ recordsPerPage } ) A JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON (A.RSV_MEMBER_ID = D.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_CLASS E ON (A.RSV_NO = E.CLS_RSV_NO ) JOIN TBL_MEMBER F ON (A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID = F.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.RNUM > #{ paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex } AND A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND A.RSV_STATE = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(RSV_DATETIME, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND D.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND E.CLS_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
SELECT A.CLS_NO , A.CLS_CONTENT , A.CLS_RSV_NO , A.CLS_MEMBER_ID , B.RSV_DATETIME FROM TBL_CLASS A JOIN TBL_RESERVATION B ON (A.CLS_RSV_NO = B.RSV_NO) WHERE A.CLS_NO = #{ no }
